Package com.cs4337.project.controller

Class ChatController

java.lang.Object
com.cs4337.project.controller.ChatController
@Controller public class ChatController extends Object
The controller class for chat rooms, received from stompJS calls. The mappings are stored here.
Author:
royfl

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      @MessageMapping("/chat.sendMsg") @SendTo("/topic/public") public ChatMessage sendMessage(@Payload ChatMessage chatMessage)
      This handles sending a user's chat message, and processing certain values such as the timestamp, before sending it off to the server.
      Parameters:
      chatMessage - the chat message as sent by the user.
      Returns:
      the formatted chat message

    • addUser

      @MessageMapping("/chat.addUser") @SendTo("/topic/public") public ChatMessage addUser(@Payload ChatMessage chatMessage, org.springframework.messaging.simp.SimpMessageHeaderAccessor headerAccessor)
      This handles sending a "user joined" message into the public topic. It pulls the username from the headerAccessor and formats and sends the message once the frontend
      Parameters:
      chatMessage - the chat message as sent by the user.
      headerAccessor - the Websocket headers, used to get the username
      Returns:
      the formatted join message

    • pmUser

      @MessageMapping("/chat.privateMessage") public ChatMessage pmUser(@Payload ChatMessage chatMessage)
